settings_notifications.notification_description: Allows the app to send messages to the system
settings_notifications.notification_hint_description: This permission can only be changed via the browser.
settings_notifications.notification_hint_part_1: Press the info or settings button at the top left next to the URL and set the permissions
settings_notifications.notification_hint_part_2: If no button is visible, you must press the button on the right
settings_notifications.reminder_lower_error: It has to be at least a day
settings_notifications.reminder_higher_error: It cannot be higher than 365 days
settings_notifications.reminder_description: When to be reminded of upcoming birthdays

settings_storage.progress_aria: Describes how much storage the app reserves from the storage

settings_app.autostart_description: Opens the app automaticly after the start of the system

settings_update.relaunch_description: After installing the update, restart the app
settings_update.relaunch_aria: Toggle app relaunch after installing update
settings_update.autosearch_description: Automatically check for updates after starting the app
settings_update.autosearch_aria: Toggle checking for Updates after starting the app

not_found.return: Press <BackToHome>here</BackToHome> to return to the home page.
